content:
# .env.example
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual credentials.
# Do NOT commit the .env file to version control.

# Betfair Credentials (Required by Sentry)
BETFAIR_APP_KEY="YOUR_APP_KEY_HERE"
BETFAIR_USERNAME="YOUR_USERNAME_HERE"
BETFAIR_PASSWORD="YOUR_PASSWORD_HERE"

# Application Security (Required)
# Generate a secure, random string for this value.
API_KEY="YOUR_SECRET_API_KEY_HERE"

# Optional Adapter Keys
TVG_API_KEY=""
RACING_AND_SPORTS_TOKEN=""
POINTSBET_API_KEY="your_api_key_here"
